property.name: chocolate.listener.kafka.topic.filtered
property.description: Kafka topic for messages filtered in listener.

property.name: chocolate.listener.kafka.topic.EPN
property.description: Kafka topic for epn channel to publish.

property.name: chocolate.listener.kafka.topic.DISPLAY
property.description: Kafka topic for display channel to publish.

property.name: chocolate.listener.journal.page.size
property.description: Size of the journal page in bytes. Must be a power of 2, should be between 4096 and 32768.

property.name: chocolate.listener.journal.pages
property.description: Number of pages in a given journal file. Must be a power of 2, should be between 1024 and 4096.

property.name: chocolate.listener.journal.alignment.size
property.description: Number of alignments in a given journal page. Must be a power of 2, should be between 128 and 512.

property.name: http.port
property.description: Local HTTP port for listener, should be 8080.

property.name: https.port
property.description: Local HTTPS port for listener, should be 8082.

property.name: lb.http.port
property.description: LB HTTP port for listener, should be 8080.

property.name: lb.https.port
property.description: LB HTTPS port for listener, should be 8082.

property.name: proxyTo
property.description: Proxy between listener and rover clusters

property.name: max.threads
property.description: Maximum number of threads to run.
